summary: Frontend utilities and at least one Upload Lesson page description were updated to a 100MB limit. Backend change to createLesson() size validation cannot be verified from the truncated backend diff, and it’s unclear whether *all* Upload Lesson helper/validation text mentions were updated due to truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Increase the backend createLesson video size validation limit from 10 MB to 100 MB (including correct 100 MB error message) in backend/main.mo.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend diff is truncated before showing createLesson() and any size-limit validation/error message logic, so there is no evidence that the 10MB limit and its error message were updated to 100MB.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update all user-facing helper/validation text on the Upload Lesson page to reflect the new 100 MB limit anywhere it currently mentions 10MB.
missing_requirements.reason: One visible string was updated to “max 100MB”, but the file is truncated and may contain additional helper/validation text (including possible remaining 10MB mentions) that cannot be verified.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/UploadLessonPage.tsx (truncated; shows 'max 100MB' in CardDescription but remainder not visible)
